scripts.build:linux:x64: ROOT_DIR=$(cd ../../ && pwd) && bash "$ROOT_DIR/scripts/ensure-openssl-zig.sh" x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu && X86_64_UNKNOWN_LINUX_GNU_OPENSSL_NO_VENDOR=1 OPENSSL_NO_VENDOR=1 OPENSSL_STATIC=1 X86_64_UNKNOWN_LINUX_GNU_OPENSSL_DIR="$ROOT_DIR/deps/openssl/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu" X86_64_UNKNOWN_LINUX_GNU_OPENSSL_LIB_DIR="$ROOT_DIR/deps/openssl/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib" X86_64_UNKNOWN_LINUX_GNU_OPENSSL_INCLUDE_DIR="$ROOT_DIR/deps/openssl/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/include" OPENSSL_DIR="$ROOT_DIR/deps/openssl/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu" OPENSSL_LIB_DIR="$ROOT_DIR/deps/openssl/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib" OPENSSL_INCLUDE_DIR="$ROOT_DIR/deps/openssl/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/include" PKG_CONFIG_ALLOW_CROSS=1 PROTOC_NO_VENDOR=1 PROTOC=$(which protoc) CC=x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu-gcc CXX=x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu-g++ AR=x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu-ar napi build --platform --release --target x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu --zig dist
scripts.build:linux:arm64: ROOT_DIR=$(cd ../../ && pwd) && bash "$ROOT_DIR/scripts/ensure-openssl-zig.sh" aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu && AARCH64_UNKNOWN_LINUX_GNU_OPENSSL_NO_VENDOR=1 OPENSSL_NO_VENDOR=1 OPENSSL_STATIC=1 AARCH64_UNKNOWN_LINUX_GNU_OPENSSL_DIR="$ROOT_DIR/deps/openssl/aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu" AARCH64_UNKNOWN_LINUX_GNU_OPENSSL_LIB_DIR="$ROOT_DIR/deps/openssl/aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib" AARCH64_UNKNOWN_LINUX_GNU_OPENSSL_INCLUDE_DIR="$ROOT_DIR/deps/openssl/aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu/include" OPENSSL_DIR="$ROOT_DIR/deps/openssl/aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu" OPENSSL_LIB_DIR="$ROOT_DIR/deps/openssl/aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib" OPENSSL_INCLUDE_DIR="$ROOT_DIR/deps/openssl/aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu/include" PKG_CONFIG_ALLOW_CROSS=1 PROTOC_NO_VENDOR=1 PROTOC=$(which protoc) CC=aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu-gcc CXX=aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu-g++ AR=aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu-ar napi build --platform --release --target aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu --zig dist
scripts.build:mac:x64: OPENSSL_DIR=$(brew --prefix openssl@3) OPENSSL_LIB_DIR=$(brew --prefix openssl@3)/lib OPENSSL_INCLUDE_DIR=$(brew --prefix openssl@3)/include arch -x86_64 napi build --release --platform --target x86_64-apple-darwin dist
